casebody.data:
Joseph Quittner et al., as Executors of Herman Levine, Deceased, v. Marilyn P. Klion.

Motion dismissed as academic on the ground that the appellant has a right to incorporate the papers on appeal in connection with the appeal taken from the decree of the Surrogate and the amended decree of the Surrogate in a single appeal book. Concur — Botein, P. J., Rabin, Valente, McNally and Stevens, JJ.
